entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Invermere
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High plus 2. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
